column4: If I wanted to create a samba share on ubuntu - what programs does it come with to help me set that up?
If I wanted to create a samba share on ubuntu - what programs does it come with to help me set that up?

I've been getting to linux alot lately this past month (namely Ubuntu)... just been trying to use debian but finding alot of it manual work which (personally) I find dumb.  I don't really like things like Xandros/Linspire as they really do hide alot of technical options - Ubuntu is very nice too but I not much for how it won't let you select what you want installed when you install Ubuntu -   Is there a nice linux OS tha
How on earth is that ran when I am installing !!!?
'''  that isnt as manual as debian but not as simple as xandros that isnt ubuntu?  ''''
when I was a kid stick was the thing I got beat with :(
if it was so simple you would of gotten an answer
Linux requires patience which sadly you dont seem to have much of but you will learn with age
Im not the one crying about how hard linux is to use and saying that linux isnt any good cuz you cant upload sum stupid ringtone to your cheap phone :P
